column2: The data collected will be used anonymously for a published report as part of the course. Non of your personal data will be shared, stored or collected.
column3: How concerned are you with food waste?
column4: Would you consider having less menu options at Polymensa in favor of less food waste?
column5: How often do you eat at the Polymensa in a typical week (lunch and dinner included)?
column6: Which factor plays the biggest role in your menu choice?
column7: When eating at the Polymensa nowadays, how often do you have food left over on your plate?
column8: If there was an option for a smaller serving with a reduced price, how often would you choose the smaller serving
column9: If there was an option for a larger serving with an increased price, how often would you choose the larger serving
column10:
Previously there was the possibility to get a second serving for certain menus. 
How common was it for you to take another serving of food?
column11: With the restriction on second servings, do you perceive the initial portion sizes to be larger, smaller, or about the same as before?
column12: Have you noticed a significant change in the amount of food waste you generate at the Polymensa after the policy change disallowing second servings?
